name: Feed the Fire
description:
Control the environment, not the player.

Help the fireball to escape the gray world by drawing new platforms. Depending on the direction you draw the platforms they will feed the fireball or cool him down and make him smaller.

Be careful and do not let him fall!

Controls:

  • draw right  - the platform will be "fire" and the fireball is getting bigger but slower.
  • draw left - the platform will be "ice" and the fireball is getting smaller and faster.

Team:

  • Alex Göschl
  • Lioba Pleschberger
